      • toIntent

        public static android.content.Intent toIntent(android.content.Context context,
                                              java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                                              NacAlarm alarm)
        Create an intent with an alarm attached in the Extra part of the intent.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        cls - The name of the class for the intent to run.
        alarm - The alarm to attach to the intent.
        Returns:
        An intent.

                                              java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                                              java.lang.String media)

        Parameters:
